## Checklist (ALL required for merge)

- [ ] Every citation is REAL and verifiable (no hallucinated law)
- [ ] Every source URL points to .gov, Cornell LII, CourtListener, or Google Scholar
- [ ] JSON files validate against `data/schemas/extended_decision_chain.schema.json`
- [ ] One state per PR (unless fixing URLs across states)
- [ ] I have not modified schemas, federal baselines, or tool scripts
